TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ButtonRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現按鈕控制項的方法 (不論有沒有視覺化樣式)。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a button control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現按鈕控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a button control. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要繪製的按鈕，使用其中一種方法。To draw a button, use one of the methods. 這些方法會提供各種不同的選項，例如繪製文字或映像 5d; 按鈕。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image on the button. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，時，會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的按鈕。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the button with the current visual style. 否則，時，會繪製具有傳統的視窗樣式的按鈕。Otherwise, will draw the button with the classic Windows style. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該會自動比對目前的作業系統的視覺化樣式設定。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目所公開類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項方法，以繪製按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a button. 當按一下按鈕時，控制項繪製的較小的按鈕 [原始] 按鈕的界限內，而且控制項使用繪製在原始的按鈕的其餘部分的方法。When the button is clicked, the control draws a smaller button inside the bounds of the original button, and the control uses the method to paint over the rest of the original button. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a button control.

span.span: The used to draw the button.
The that specifies the bounds of the button.

param.name: state
param.span: 的其中一個值，指定按鈕的可見狀態。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the button.

summary.span: 在指定的狀態和範圍中繪製按鈕控制項。

span.span: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的按鈕。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style. 否則，它會繪製具有傳統的視窗樣式的按鈕。Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool RenderMatchingApplicationState { get; set; }
.property bool RenderMatchingApplicationState
Public Shared Property RenderMatchingApplicationState As Boolean
public: static property bool RenderMatchingApplicationState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出產生器是否會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`、使用中的設定屬性來判斷轉譯樣式。If the property is `true`, the uses the setting from the property to determine the rendering style. 如果是`false`，轉譯器永遠會轉譯使用視覺化樣式。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
